item.description:
Hi Everyone,

For our September Social event we have put together a day trip to Boston, MA. We will likely meet up prior to departure and carpool into Boston. Some of the activities we have planned for this day include exploring the Freedom Trail, a visit to the Isabel Stewart Gardner Museum, catch what is playing at the Mugar Omni Theater and Dinner in the North end.

More details to follow.

Hope you can join us.
item.name: Day Trip to Boston.
